headline: NVR, INC. ANNOUNCES SHARE REPURCHASE AUTHORIZATION
summary: NVR, Inc. (NYSE: NVR) announces that its Board of Directors has authorized the repurchase of up to an aggregate of $750 million of its outstanding common stock. The repurchase authorization does not have an expiration date. The purchases will occur from time to time in the open market and/or in privately negotiated transactions as market conditions permit. The Company indicated that the authorization is a continuation of the stock repurchase program that began in 1994 and is consistent with NVR'
